summary: Jorge Romo Fuentes  was a Mexican football midfielder.
full_text:
Jorge Romo Fuentes  was a Mexican football midfielder who played for Mexico in the 1954 and 1958 FIFA World Cups. He also played for Club Deportivo Marte and Deportivo Toluca.
^ 1954 FIFA World Cup Switzerland
^ "Fallece Jorge Romo, ex mundialista mexicano". 17 June 2014. Retrieved 17 June 2014.
title: Jorge Romo
